channel.title: Club Penguin (don't read if you're a pedophile or sex offender)
channel.description:
A few days ago i came upon this game on miniclip called club penguin (you cant miss it) its similar but nothing like a cross between animal crossing and RS. its childish but its whimsical. U gotta try it out ppls, most of the players there are like eight to fourteen years old but its fun going around reviving your childhood, and decking the kids out in a game of connect four or sledding... that is if you're not a child :|
they ban you for saying cuss words, about a 24 hour refrain
here's the link: http://www.miniclip.com/games/club-penguin/en/

item.title: Club Penguin (don't read if you're a pedophile or sex offender)
item.dc:creator: @Loucetios Loucetios
item.description:
@Loucetios wrote:

i understand where your comming from with that childish stuff. I found a cook way to cheat that lvl 1 sledding game. Theres a spot in it that is impossible to hit anything. Win everytime. But it stinks that you cant get anywhere in that game without buying membership.

Never in a lifetime would i buy membership for it.
